service.name: Skin IQ • 3D Skin Consultation

seo.title: Skin IQ 3D Skin Consultation in Westfield & Carmel, IN | RELUXE Med Spa
seo.description: Our 3D skin consultation pairs Alma IQ AI analysis with expert esthetician guidance to create a program that actually fits your skin, lifestyle, and goals.

overview.p1: Skin IQ maps texture, pores, pigment, and tone in 3D, then uses AI insights to spotlight what matters most for *your* skin.
overview.p2: Your esthetician translates the data into a practical plan—clinic treatments, at-home products, and check-ins—so you can track progress over time.

whyReluxe.title: AI + human expertise
whyReluxe.body: Alma IQ analysis interpreted by experienced RELUXE estheticians.

whyReluxe.title: Clear plan, not guesswork
whyReluxe.body: Treatment roadmap and product routine tailored to your skin and schedule.

whyReluxe.title: Trackable results
whyReluxe.body: Re-scan to see measurable changes and fine-tune your plan.

service.tagline: See beneath the surface. Plan smarter.

howItWorks.title: Consultation
howItWorks.body: We review your goals, history, and design a personalized plan.

howItWorks.title: Treatment
howItWorks.body: Quick, precise session performed by our experts.

howItWorks.title: Aftercare
howItWorks.body: Simple steps for best results. We check in with you.

items.heading: Pigment & redness
items.body: Brown spots, UV signatures, and vascular redness.

items.heading: Lines & firmness
items.body: Fine lines, laxity markers, and tone.

items.heading: Progress tracking
items.body: Re-scan to visualize change and refine your plan.

faq.a: Most patients describe mild, brief discomfort. We can use numbing when appropriate.
Some results are immediate; full effect often appears by 1–2 weeks depending on service.
